First Gamerguuy great torrent

Second, this works perfectly fine as it is. The issue comes from trying to get the crack from the CD, as sometimes the .dll that comes with it is listed as a virus(its not one) if that happens your AV program deletes the .dll file and the game wont work right. 

Thats what happened to me. After I ok'd the .dll( after checking it on virustotal) the game loaded up fine and i went on my way. Love this game btw.

Install Notes:

1. Unpack release
2. Mount image or burn it
3. Install
4. Use this serial: SKID-ROW0-RULE-YOUR-WORL-D431
5. Copy the content from the SKIDROW directory on the CD to your installation directory and overwrite
6. Play the game
